mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, pw, name, nickname, email, phone, address, height, weight, age, gender, isPublic) VALUE (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word},'%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word},'%') OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word},'%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word},'%')
